posts.title: Elon Musk's DOGE teams cut critical funding from America's libraries, officials say
top_comments: I kind of miss the days when rich people donated to libraries, museums, research, universities, and hospitals in hopes they will be remembered for their contributions to society.

America made him the richest man in the world.  You'd think he'd be so happy and grateful he'd try to GIVE BACK?

Nope.  THIS is how he repays our generosity:

Destroying American Institutions, Chainsawing through our assets and  investments, Terminating those working to keep the government's pact with The People, Threatening those who defy him with prison or illegal rendition.

He's proud of it.  And with billions in the bank, this compulsive liar and grifter throws bribes at American voters to recruit MORE devils to do his bidding.

Musk is THE most grotesque Potter ("It's a Wonderful Life"), whose only friend and family is money, whose only aim in life is replacing our best hopes for America - the source of his wealth - with a dark, evil, dystopian nightmare.

I live alone and paycheck to paycheck. I don’t have family I can rely on financially, and I earn JUST enough to be disqualified from food stamps, internet subsidies, and most other assistance programs. I even considered asking my employers to pay me less.

The public library has been a lifeline for me. I get free internet there (hotspot I can take home), access to the graphic design software I use for work, and even borrow kitchen and hardware tools. Unlike many programs, the library doesn’t require you to prove you’re poor — it just helps.

This is why cutting funding or undermining libraries is not just shortsighted — it’s harmful. The library gave me hope when I had to cancel my internet service. It continues to fill gaps that our safety net leaves behind.

I’m attending a protest today because these “smaller” cuts and policy changes are easy for people to ignore. Part of me fears it’ll take something as big as Social Security or Medicare being touched before people realize what’s at stake.
Explain to me again why everyone's life has to be decimated for billionaire tax cuts again.

So in DOGE’s assessment libraries are waste, fraud or abuse. Libraries!

Basically whichever program they don’t like is deemed to be waste.

In the past rich people would donate large sums of money for the establishment of institutions of  learning. But now the richest guy in the world is gutting libraries.  And getting off on it. (“Chainsaw!”)

If anyone is wondering why Musk and Friends are targeting schools and libraries so viciously, history holds the answer. Slavery "officially" ended in America in 1865, but it continued for decades thanks to loopholes in the form of predatory contracts. African Americans who had been kept illiterate by slavery were tricked into signing contracts with their former masters in which they were sold land in exchange for a percentage of their crops. The contracts were routinely altered, however, to make it impossible to actually pay off that land, creating a cycle of permanent debt slavery. It wasn't until reformers from the North started opening Black schools, and the people became educated, that African Americans were able to read and understand the contracts they were signing, seek legal counsel, find representation in Washington, etc. In other words, slavery doesn't end with an amendment. It ends with education.

“ I love the poorly educated”- trump 

‘

I am a librarian that works in a state that got our IMLS grant cut. Over 2 million dollars in grant money that supports summer reading programs, statewide ebook and audiobook lending programs, braille books for patrons, also lending programs for veterans...and more.

According to DOGE, it was "good work getting rid of DEI waste" or whatever b.s. they said. 

Good work being heartless jerks.
Elon just doesn't want those pesky books distracting him from staying on top of the Path of Exile leaderboard.
a poorly educated populace is easier to control

posts.title: Trans student’s arrest for violating Florida bathroom law is thought to be a first
top_comments: I think this was done to create a legal test case. Given she notified everyone beforehand.
You don’t have to worry about the trans girl. The one who is more likely to assault your daughter is the republican lawmaker or preacher telling you this law is necessary.
I'm curious what would happen if a bunch of ftm, like full on male presenting, people started going into female bathrooms.

Transgender bathroom bans do absolutely nothing to help others. Their only purpose is to harm Transgender people.

If you don't stand up for the rights of LGBTQ+ Americans, what makes you think there will be anyone to stand up for your rights when someone decides you should be oppressed?

I mean this whole thing is nonsense. I know a few trans people and they were all scared shitless of going in their new gender’s bathroom during their transition. No-one trans is doing anything in there except trying to get out again without being noticed.

Also in Florida a cis woman lost her job at Walmart when a man went into the ladies room and accused her of being trans. They said she was a security risk because she didn’t tell a salaried manager (she told her supervisor who wasn’t salaried) about the incident. She isn’t trans. People just want to poop and there are already laws against doing dastardly and indecent things in public. Anti trans laws are just discriminatory and hateful. 

https://www.newsweek.com/woman-says-she-was-fired-after-threats-man-who-made-trans-accusation-2051777
Utter madness that such a law could even exist.

US actually ARREST people for this?  

What a country.

This was her intention, however it does highlight how absurd this law is and how non-enforceable it really is. Had she not declared her intentions, literally no one would look at her and think "that's a dude"
It would be much more traumatic seeing her in the Men's room.

posts.title: National Weather Service pauses severe weather alerts in Spanish and other languages
top_comments: Cruelty is the point of this

You know what I really appreciate when I'm traveling? When announcements are made in the local language and in English. They don't have to do that, but it helps keep everyone safe and keep things running smoothly. But these people aren't interested in safety or efficiency, just revanchist cruelty.
If Trump can't understand your language, he will try to eliminate it.
This administration leads with hate and there are many MAGA members who eat it up.
I think this will fix the economy. Thanks Trump.,

Had a tornado alert that woke me up the other night. It had a second page in Spanish and the first thing I thought in my half asleep mind was that I bet that's going to be taken off soon. Looks like it only took two days.

Warning labels, road signs, hospital forms, 911 dispatch, the list will grow.

He's not just disrespecting y'all, he's tryna kill you.
Having lived overseas, this is cruel and unnecessary.  Cherishing human life should be a foundation of all US citizens and political parties.
Man, the bingo squares are filling up fast.  It doesn't matter what card you have or how many.
Oh thank god someone finally saved us from the tyranny of tornado warnings in Spanish /s.

posts.title: Auctioning off millennial saint-to-be’s relics is Satan’s work, archbishop says
top_comments:
> Relics, from strands of hair to bone fragments, have long been important devotional items for the Catholic faithful, and the Church encourages praying in front of relics of saints and saints-to-be, but canon law prohibits their sale, according to Sorrentino.
They can be given away by their owner or by bishops, while significant relics, such as hearts and organs, cannot be given away without permission from the Vatican. But this can never be for financial compensation, Sorrentino said in a video posted on the diocese website.

The poor kid passed away from Leukemia at 15, and people are looking to buy supposed parts of his body online.
Only the Catholic Church should profit from the selling of relics!
"The Playstation of Saint Carlo"

Relics used to be stolen by rival factions within the church. 


https://daily.jstor.org/when-monks-went-undercover-to-steal-relics/
that's pretty fucked up. especially if its his blood. He passed away due to cancer, it would be fucked to sell some kids blood vial or something like that

Let's be real a second.

Got no problem with people believing in god, but the church has been undoubtedly been doing Satan's work for 2k years. Including buying and selling relics. But also things like, genocide, murder, torture, religious persecution, funding and starting wars, supporting slavery, more torture, theft, and basically whatever else you can think of.

Organized religion in general, and Christianity in particular, is easily responsible for more suffering on this planet than basically everything else combined. Directly, through things like myriad religious wars, the Trail of Tears, the Crusades and the Spanish Inquesition, and indirectly, through their faith being used as an excuse to persecute minorities in basically every conceivable way. Even things like the Holocaust can indirectly be tied to Christianity and Christians doing their thing.

If the church listened to it's own teachings, it wouldn't be fucking rich.

Also let's not forget modern things, like only providing aid to people in Africa if they convert, or suppressing gays, or covering up child abuse on a massive scale, or about fighting against science, or even just not practicing the things they even preach, and changing the rules about which things in the Bible they follow and which they dont. So basically fuck this guy. If hell is actually real he will be burning in it shortly, based on the rules of his own faith.

posts.title: U.S. Peace Corps says Musk's DOGE has arrived at its HQ
top_comments: This administration is amplifying everything people dislike about the US while simultaneously destroying everything people do like about the US.
I can't imagine an agency with less fat than the Peace Corps; the stipends are miniscule.
So, what exactly happens if an agency simply doesn’t cooperate with DOGE?

The Musk/Trump administration doesn't understand the concept of 'soft power'. Furthermore, they're entirely unwilling to listen to the argument for it. America's greatness (such that it ever existed) comes in large part to it's effective use of soft power. The Marshall Plan, the Peace Corps and NASA all have a roll in advancing America's interest abroad. Dollar-for-dollar these programs grew the brand of America more than it's military or direct diplomacy ever could on its own. Wait two years to see.
The grim reaper has arrived. Aside from Trump , Netanyahu and Putin,  Elon is the most unpopular person in the world today.
That is easily the dumbest hat I've seen in quite a while and we've all seen a LOT of MAGA hats.

It's painfully obvious that the whole administration has bought into some absolute bullshit lie from Elon Musk about his, garbage tier, Grok AI being ready to take over most of the federal government's functions. Elon is a great con man when dealing with people who understand tech. When he starts selling shit to the types of people in the Trump admin it is like shooting fish in a barrel. This whole experiment is going to destroy the US standing in the world, it's economy, and the US tech industry. We are getting Xed at a national scale. If you voted for this you are an absolute fucking dipshit.
Have you noticed that DOGE does the worst things on Friday afternoons? DOGE fears accountability
You have to be truly evil and dead inside to dismantle the Peace Corps. There’s a special place in hell reserved for Elon Musk.
Now Musk and Doge can f right off.  Peace Corp was created by JFK.  HANDS OFF!! MOTHAF'ERS!!!

top_comments: It's not over till he's home.

if we lived in a sane country, he and his family would be able to sue for tens of millions. the entire saga is fucking ridiculous. 

"we know we fucked up, but it would be against our shit plan to undo it so cope ig"
an innocent man just can be held in jail?  What kind of crazy idea is that ... oh due process?  human rights?...huh I am pretty sure the Republican party gave those up

Interesting how the Trump admin indicates it can do nothing about retrieving this man from El Salvador with whom it has very friendly relations, yet it was able to get Mexico to bring back the 2 Caucasian people who were in jail for defrauding a timeshare company in Mexico after 2 weeks of negotiating (as they were apparently guilty of the fraud).

So all that is really at play here is that the Trump admin does not want to bring this person back, because they are not white.  It is as simple as that.

The truth is this Nazi admin doesn't want this man back because he'll be able to speak on how terrible and inhumane the treatment is at this death camp. They could get him back no problem, its that it would not bode well for them if they did.
Republicans would call this judicial overreach

And for every story like this we see, you just *know* there's a hundred cataclysmic fuck-ups that we're not seeing. 

Last time this ape was in charge his equivocating gibberish and asinine policies exacerbated a deadly pandemic [leading to many, many unnecessary COVID deaths] (https://www.businessinsider.com/analysis-trump-covid-19-response-40-percent-us-deaths-avoidable-2021-2?op=1) and [dead Americans in general](https://www.forbes.com/sites/tommybeer/2021/02/11/trumps-policies-resulted-in-the-unnecessary-deaths-of-hundreds-of-thousands-of-americans-lancet-report/) but none of this ever gets brought up and he surely sleeps like a baby.

I shudder to think of what we don't know.
I hope he's returned swiftly and safely, but I doubt part of disappearing people is keeping track of where they wind up at the other end. I've never worked as a human trafficker, so idk.
If we can extradite someone from another country, for a criminal case, then how can the government say here, “he’s already gone, there’s nothing we can do [shrug]”?

It sounds like if the courts “don’t have jurisdiction over him”, the courts need to jail the agents and the department heads that they do have “jurisdiction” over for contempt until they figure out how to produce him.

posts.title: 5 nurses who work on the same floor at Massachusetts hospital have brain tumors
top_comments:
I wonder if they all sat in the same area at work?  


Perhaps near a shared wall with an imaging department that was not constructed properly?

Reminds me of the [Kramatorsk incident where residents were exposed to gamma radiation](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kramatorsk_radiological_accident) due to a capsule containing highly radioactive caesium-17 being in their walls. Residents kept succumbing to leukaemia.
The hospital investigated themselves and they did nothing wrong.
just a coincidence I'm sure
I’m sure RFK Jr. will get to the bottom of it…

I know several nurses who have developed brain tumors. So many hospital units have big heaters for CHG wipes and wet wipes. Could there be a link? Healthcare workers near these heaters are inhaling heated plastics their entire shift. You can smell the plastic in the air around the heaters.
I feel like this situation is placing the burden of proof on the individuals with the brain tumors.

Sounds like insurance premiums are going up. Anyways something is a foul here. Definitely something with the equipment or the environment. It's not safe working at that hospital. Sucks for everyone else too.
Is it the same type of tumor?

I used ChatGPT for this so take it with a grain of salt, but it said the chances of this happening "naturally" is about 1 in a trillion. 
They were exposed to something, there is no doubt.

posts.title: Woman, 20, sentenced for false rape report that jailed innocent man for a month
top_comments: Feel so bad for this guy, anyone who has tried to get a search result taken off of google knows how impossible it is through their bots. On top of the false charge he will have to explain this surely emotionally draining charge to any employer or future girlfriend

Many years ago (I was around 17) I was accused of assault and rape by a woman I had never met, never seen before. I was arrested and detained and sent to Juvenile Detention. My parents lawyered up, Bailed me out 3 days or so later. It ended when her story kept changing and I had no wounds on my hands or face the night I was booked.  Can go much deeper in to the story but I won’t bore y’all. It was scary. She knew my address, phone number (land line back then) my vehicle, my overall everything. I was at my GF’s house after school, did some day boozing, walked 2 blocks home, and went to bed. Then I was “woken up” about 4 hours later. Lots of people I’ve told the story too have said “I’ve had handled it this way”. But I was woken up from a dead sleep, completely confused, 3 cops screaming at me, my dad freaking out, my mom in hysterics. 

There were no consequences for the accuser. I moved across country for school and that was it. That was around ‘89 or ‘90. Fucking sucked.

I was a victim of a girl who raped me and stalked me.  I avoided her at all costs, and she eventually moved on.  I suspect she had the same sort of relationship with the next guy she started dating - because I know she was very upset with him.  showed up at a bar, and acted all drunk, and brought him out to her car, where she had sex with him.  he went back into the bar and she ran in and said he raped her.  

The guy was taken away in handcuffs, and couldn't believe what was happening to him.  She eventually came clean, but the damage was done - the dude had mugshots, and was arrested in the middle of a crowded bar.  she didn't get so much as a slap on the wrist.  From what I understand, the guy was just so happy to have the charges dropped against him.  But he should have pressed charges against her for the damage she did to him.  

This was about 20 years ago that this happened.  and I still worry about how I was just a few months away from being 'the guy' in this story.
I'm sure the 41 year old guy who faced a month in jail with his name and picture plastered over press releases will never face any ongoing discrimination when his name comes up in job searches
I'm actually surprised she went to jail...

>  and pay $3,600 in restitution to the victim.

Straight to civil court for me! I’m asking for no less than $50k, that’s assuming there are no other damages besides my time for a month.

I used to be a college professor and told freshmen over and over:  Rape can happen to you; false rape allegations can happen to you. Never put yourself in a vulnerable position.  If you are drinking, go with friends and STAY with friends.

That isn’t a surefire preventative but it helps.

As a woman - I'm glad to see this.

Scumbags like her are a big reason why actual victims aren't believed. Her punishment is way too light, in my opinion, though.

My question is why did it take a month to free him. I went and found the reporting of his original arrest

https://www.cbsnews.com/philadelphia/news/daniel-pierson-arrest-attempted-rape-kidnapping-middletown-township-grocery-store-parking-lot/

>"Pierson is known to police to be a methamphetamine user," the release said.

Guess they thought they had to add that in there. Bail was set at somewhere under a million so that is why he was in jail...

I’ve gotten SA’d before but no one ever believed me, not even my own family. Oh why, because I’m a big strong man so it wouldn’t have happened, like cmon jfc how does that have anything to do with what happened. I’m still traumatized and I haven’t spoken about it in years and never will since it won’t ever get anywhere only make me feel worse about myself.

posts.title: DACA recipient and Kansas City father of 3 deported to Mexico despite valid documentation
top_comments: Why taking the time for due process matters.  A lot.

Maga is too stupid to know that you can't unmix the chocolate from the cake.

So it's just a theater of pain and humiliation for immigrants till "The Stupidest Generation" dies out.
The objective was always cruelty.
Can they even do this?

Wow. For legal residents to be cautioned against traveling is frightening beyond belief. Pretty soon, passport holding, US born citizens, (like myself ) will be cautioned against speaking or writing comments protected by the US Constitution for fear of being sent to a re-education 'camp'.

If you think it's funny, would you have believed 5 months ago that things like this would/could happen ?

The things we hold dear and believe to be natural rights are being burned bit by bit...and it's getting hotter by the second.

Whatever your feeling on immigration is, it's insane how much DACA recipients' lives have been played with.

Apparently people want countries not to send their "worst." Well they were/are the definition of it. They are people who were ready to better their lives thru education.

Both sides of the team sports have let them down and it has been a travesty. If you're going to invest anything into a goal, why not see the goal thru to the logical end. If you don't, what was the point of wasted resources
immigrants enrich america. if not all you got are dumb red nec…. oh i get it
What i find interesting is there hasn't been one ICE whistlebower. Like nobody working DHS is willing to expose what agents are actually being instructed to do.
Remember when they said it wasn't a racist thing because he was only going to go after the illegal immigrants?

I’m curious to hear why the removal order was issued in the first place. 30 years in America, no memory of life in Mexico was a child, established family in our society, the removal order pre-dates the January 2025 ruling that DACA is unconstitutional so it’s not based on that. Was the removal order a mistake? It’s been 10 months since it was issued. Why the delay in enforcing it? Also, WHY WAS IT ISSUED after 30 years in the country? All the DACA paperwork was in order, renewed every two years. This should be the precedent establishing case that the ACLU takes up.

posts.title: LA County reaches $4 billion agreement to settle sexual abuse claims at juvenile facilities
top_comments: This is sickening, and they wonder why these kids are having a hard time in life.

> Los Angeles County has reached a $4 billion agreement to settle nearly 7,000 claims of sexual abuse in juvenile facilities since 1959, officials said Friday.
I'm used to seeing millions for settlements, fucking *billions*? That's unfathomable.
don't forget that's 4b of your tax money!
Taxpayers shouldn’t be footing the bill for pervs behaviour.  Abusers themselves need to be held accountable.
Is it REALLY so hard to just jerk off in the bathroom instead of molesting children??!
Are they also going to ask them politely to stop?
Payday for the lawyers. It's good to fight the fight, but this justice feels incomplete.

posts.title: Elon Musk's DOGE teams cut critical funding from America's libraries, officials say
top_comments: I kind of miss the days when rich people donated to libraries, museums, research, universities, and hospitals in hopes they will be remembered for their contributions to society.

America made him the richest man in the world.  You'd think he'd be so happy and grateful he'd try to GIVE BACK?

Nope.  THIS is how he repays our generosity:

Destroying American Institutions, Chainsawing through our assets and  investments, Terminating those working to keep the government's pact with The People, Threatening those who defy him with prison or illegal rendition.

He's proud of it.  And with billions in the bank, this compulsive liar and grifter throws bribes at American voters to recruit MORE devils to do his bidding.

Musk is THE most grotesque Potter ("It's a Wonderful Life"), whose only friend and family is money, whose only aim in life is replacing our best hopes for America - the source of his wealth - with a dark, evil, dystopian nightmare.

I live alone and paycheck to paycheck. I don’t have family I can rely on financially, and I earn JUST enough to be disqualified from food stamps, internet subsidies, and most other assistance programs. I even considered asking my employers to pay me less.

The public library has been a lifeline for me. I get free internet there (hotspot I can take home), access to the graphic design software I use for work, and even borrow kitchen and hardware tools. Unlike many programs, the library doesn’t require you to prove you’re poor — it just helps.

This is why cutting funding or undermining libraries is not just shortsighted — it’s harmful. The library gave me hope when I had to cancel my internet service. It continues to fill gaps that our safety net leaves behind.

I’m attending a protest today because these “smaller” cuts and policy changes are easy for people to ignore. Part of me fears it’ll take something as big as Social Security or Medicare being touched before people realize what’s at stake.
Explain to me again why everyone's life has to be decimated for billionaire tax cuts again.

So in DOGE’s assessment libraries are waste, fraud or abuse. Libraries!

Basically whichever program they don’t like is deemed to be waste.

In the past rich people would donate large sums of money for the establishment of institutions of  learning. But now the richest guy in the world is gutting libraries.  And getting off on it. (“Chainsaw!”)

If anyone is wondering why Musk and Friends are targeting schools and libraries so viciously, history holds the answer. Slavery "officially" ended in America in 1865, but it continued for decades thanks to loopholes in the form of predatory contracts. African Americans who had been kept illiterate by slavery were tricked into signing contracts with their former masters in which they were sold land in exchange for a percentage of their crops. The contracts were routinely altered, however, to make it impossible to actually pay off that land, creating a cycle of permanent debt slavery. It wasn't until reformers from the North started opening Black schools, and the people became educated, that African Americans were able to read and understand the contracts they were signing, seek legal counsel, find representation in Washington, etc. In other words, slavery doesn't end with an amendment. It ends with education.

“ I love the poorly educated”- trump 

‘

I am a librarian that works in a state that got our IMLS grant cut. Over 2 million dollars in grant money that supports summer reading programs, statewide ebook and audiobook lending programs, braille books for patrons, also lending programs for veterans...and more.

According to DOGE, it was "good work getting rid of DEI waste" or whatever b.s. they said. 

Good work being heartless jerks.
Elon just doesn't want those pesky books distracting him from staying on top of the Path of Exile leaderboard.
a poorly educated populace is easier to control

posts.title: DACA recipient and Kansas City father of 3 deported to Mexico despite valid documentation
top_comments: Why taking the time for due process matters.  A lot.

Maga is too stupid to know that you can't unmix the chocolate from the cake.

So it's just a theater of pain and humiliation for immigrants till "The Stupidest Generation" dies out.
The objective was always cruelty.
Can they even do this?

Wow. For legal residents to be cautioned against traveling is frightening beyond belief. Pretty soon, passport holding, US born citizens, (like myself ) will be cautioned against speaking or writing comments protected by the US Constitution for fear of being sent to a re-education 'camp'.

If you think it's funny, would you have believed 5 months ago that things like this would/could happen ?

The things we hold dear and believe to be natural rights are being burned bit by bit...and it's getting hotter by the second.

Whatever your feeling on immigration is, it's insane how much DACA recipients' lives have been played with.

Apparently people want countries not to send their "worst." Well they were/are the definition of it. They are people who were ready to better their lives thru education.

Both sides of the team sports have let them down and it has been a travesty. If you're going to invest anything into a goal, why not see the goal thru to the logical end. If you don't, what was the point of wasted resources
immigrants enrich america. if not all you got are dumb red nec…. oh i get it
What i find interesting is there hasn't been one ICE whistlebower. Like nobody working DHS is willing to expose what agents are actually being instructed to do.
Remember when they said it wasn't a racist thing because he was only going to go after the illegal immigrants?

I’m curious to hear why the removal order was issued in the first place. 30 years in America, no memory of life in Mexico was a child, established family in our society, the removal order pre-dates the January 2025 ruling that DACA is unconstitutional so it’s not based on that. Was the removal order a mistake? It’s been 10 months since it was issued. Why the delay in enforcing it? Also, WHY WAS IT ISSUED after 30 years in the country? All the DACA paperwork was in order, renewed every two years. This should be the precedent establishing case that the ACLU takes up.

posts.title: Tech megacaps lose $1.8 trillion in 2 days as Trump tariffs lead Nasdaq to worst weekly drop in 5 years
top_comments:
>...worst weekly drop in 5 years.

The worst drop since the last time he was in office.

From the article:

\- Apple has nosedived the most, shaving off more than $533 billion in market capitalization.

\- Tesla shaved off more than $89 in market cap, bringing its two-day tally to more than $139 billion

\- Meta plummeted more than $200 billion

\- [Amazon](https://www.cnbc.com/quotes/AMZN/) dropped $265 billion

\- Alphabet:  $139 billion

\- Microsoft: $165 billion

That's some unbelievable destruction of wealth!
We are WINNING! THIS IS THE GREATEST WINNING. 🤡
Trump Tax causing the Trump Recession
Headline should say the worst weekly drop since the last time Trump was in office.
Worst drop in 5 years, wasn’t rump the president 5 years ago lmao
You act like they aren't also buying this dip to consolidate and concentrate more wealth away from the masses.

When Biden was in office Faux News pundits all said you can tell how good a job a president is doing by reading the Stock Market. When the market under Biden was doing great Faux News barely covered the story. When Trump was inaugurated the market went up and Faux News said see how great the market is going knowing Trump is president. Now Faux News pundits are saying the market is not a good indicator on how well a president is performing. Also, not one word from Faux News on the rise in unemployment. Hypocrisy and morons are reporting on our countries free fall into the next Great Depression. Will need a new name for all those out of work people who camp out in DC, Hooverville has already been used.

Three Months In $5 Trillion Destroyed.

Go defensive - protect what you have left. The bottom is still ways away.

And don't suffer quietly. Keep calling your congressmouse and ask it to do its job.
I have a NASDAQ heavy portfolio and got cut down about 30% since Trump took office. Yesterday and today was like a two-hit punch to the grill.

posts.title: 5 nurses who work on the same floor at Massachusetts hospital have brain tumors
top_comments:
I wonder if they all sat in the same area at work?  


Perhaps near a shared wall with an imaging department that was not constructed properly?

Reminds me of the [Kramatorsk incident where residents were exposed to gamma radiation](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kramatorsk_radiological_accident) due to a capsule containing highly radioactive caesium-17 being in their walls. Residents kept succumbing to leukaemia.
The hospital investigated themselves and they did nothing wrong.
just a coincidence I'm sure
I’m sure RFK Jr. will get to the bottom of it…

I know several nurses who have developed brain tumors. So many hospital units have big heaters for CHG wipes and wet wipes. Could there be a link? Healthcare workers near these heaters are inhaling heated plastics their entire shift. You can smell the plastic in the air around the heaters.
I feel like this situation is placing the burden of proof on the individuals with the brain tumors.

Sounds like insurance premiums are going up. Anyways something is a foul here. Definitely something with the equipment or the environment. It's not safe working at that hospital. Sucks for everyone else too.
Is it the same type of tumor?

I used ChatGPT for this so take it with a grain of salt, but it said the chances of this happening "naturally" is about 1 in a trillion. 
They were exposed to something, there is no doubt.

posts.title: National Weather Service pauses severe weather alerts in Spanish and other languages
top_comments: Cruelty is the point of this

You know what I really appreciate when I'm traveling? When announcements are made in the local language and in English. They don't have to do that, but it helps keep everyone safe and keep things running smoothly. But these people aren't interested in safety or efficiency, just revanchist cruelty.
If Trump can't understand your language, he will try to eliminate it.
This administration leads with hate and there are many MAGA members who eat it up.
I think this will fix the economy. Thanks Trump.,

Had a tornado alert that woke me up the other night. It had a second page in Spanish and the first thing I thought in my half asleep mind was that I bet that's going to be taken off soon. Looks like it only took two days.

Warning labels, road signs, hospital forms, 911 dispatch, the list will grow.

He's not just disrespecting y'all, he's tryna kill you.
Having lived overseas, this is cruel and unnecessary.  Cherishing human life should be a foundation of all US citizens and political parties.
Man, the bingo squares are filling up fast.  It doesn't matter what card you have or how many.
Oh thank god someone finally saved us from the tyranny of tornado warnings in Spanish /s.

posts.title: Trans student’s arrest for violating Florida bathroom law is thought to be a first
top_comments: I think this was done to create a legal test case. Given she notified everyone beforehand.
You don’t have to worry about the trans girl. The one who is more likely to assault your daughter is the republican lawmaker or preacher telling you this law is necessary.
I'm curious what would happen if a bunch of ftm, like full on male presenting, people started going into female bathrooms.

Transgender bathroom bans do absolutely nothing to help others. Their only purpose is to harm Transgender people.

If you don't stand up for the rights of LGBTQ+ Americans, what makes you think there will be anyone to stand up for your rights when someone decides you should be oppressed?

I mean this whole thing is nonsense. I know a few trans people and they were all scared shitless of going in their new gender’s bathroom during their transition. No-one trans is doing anything in there except trying to get out again without being noticed.

Also in Florida a cis woman lost her job at Walmart when a man went into the ladies room and accused her of being trans. They said she was a security risk because she didn’t tell a salaried manager (she told her supervisor who wasn’t salaried) about the incident. She isn’t trans. People just want to poop and there are already laws against doing dastardly and indecent things in public. Anti trans laws are just discriminatory and hateful. 

https://www.newsweek.com/woman-says-she-was-fired-after-threats-man-who-made-trans-accusation-2051777
Utter madness that such a law could even exist.

US actually ARREST people for this?  

What a country.

This was her intention, however it does highlight how absurd this law is and how non-enforceable it really is. Had she not declared her intentions, literally no one would look at her and think "that's a dude"
It would be much more traumatic seeing her in the Men's room.

don't forget that's 4b of your tax money!
Taxpayers shouldn’t be footing the bill for pervs behaviour.  Abusers themselves need to be held accountable.
Is it REALLY so hard to just jerk off in the bathroom instead of molesting children??!
Are they also going to ask them politely to stop?
Payday for the lawyers. It's good to fight the fight, but this justice feels incomplete.

posts.title: Auctioning off millennial saint-to-be’s relics is Satan’s work, archbishop says
top_comments:
> Relics, from strands of hair to bone fragments, have long been important devotional items for the Catholic faithful, and the Church encourages praying in front of relics of saints and saints-to-be, but canon law prohibits their sale, according to Sorrentino.
They can be given away by their owner or by bishops, while significant relics, such as hearts and organs, cannot be given away without permission from the Vatican. But this can never be for financial compensation, Sorrentino said in a video posted on the diocese website.

The poor kid passed away from Leukemia at 15, and people are looking to buy supposed parts of his body online.
Only the Catholic Church should profit from the selling of relics!
"The Playstation of Saint Carlo"

Relics used to be stolen by rival factions within the church. 


https://daily.jstor.org/when-monks-went-undercover-to-steal-relics/
that's pretty fucked up. especially if its his blood. He passed away due to cancer, it would be fucked to sell some kids blood vial or something like that

Let's be real a second.

Got no problem with people believing in god, but the church has been undoubtedly been doing Satan's work for 2k years. Including buying and selling relics. But also things like, genocide, murder, torture, religious persecution, funding and starting wars, supporting slavery, more torture, theft, and basically whatever else you can think of.

Organized religion in general, and Christianity in particular, is easily responsible for more suffering on this planet than basically everything else combined. Directly, through things like myriad religious wars, the Trail of Tears, the Crusades and the Spanish Inquesition, and indirectly, through their faith being used as an excuse to persecute minorities in basically every conceivable way. Even things like the Holocaust can indirectly be tied to Christianity and Christians doing their thing.

If the church listened to it's own teachings, it wouldn't be fucking rich.

Also let's not forget modern things, like only providing aid to people in Africa if they convert, or suppressing gays, or covering up child abuse on a massive scale, or about fighting against science, or even just not practicing the things they even preach, and changing the rules about which things in the Bible they follow and which they dont. Basically every Christian alive today cherry picks what rules from the Bible they want to follow, and which rules they choose to pretend dont exist.

So basically fuck this guy. If hell is actually real he will be burning in it shortly, based on the rules of his own faith.

Edit: Y'all can downvote me all you want, but I hope anyone who does is willing to actually come up with a reasonable argument against what I am saying.
Good thing it's all made up bullshit then, huh?
He was well past the age the bishops cared about his body parts in life, but now they care.
Coming from the group who ONLY make saints who died horrifically and believe jesus had magic powers? lol ok. And also hides pedos too.
A Catholic archbishop should keep his mouth shut on what's moral or immoral. We all know what he's covered up, and possibly even done himself.

posts.title: U.S. Peace Corps says Musk's DOGE has arrived at its HQ
top_comments: This administration is amplifying everything people dislike about the US while simultaneously destroying everything people do like about the US.
I can't imagine an agency with less fat than the Peace Corps; the stipends are miniscule.
So, what exactly happens if an agency simply doesn’t cooperate with DOGE?

The Musk/Trump administration doesn't understand the concept of 'soft power'. Furthermore, they're entirely unwilling to listen to the argument for it. America's greatness (such that it ever existed) comes in large part to it's effective use of soft power. The Marshall Plan, the Peace Corps and NASA all have a roll in advancing America's interest abroad. Dollar-for-dollar these programs grew the brand of America more than it's military or direct diplomacy ever could on its own. Wait two years to see.
The grim reaper has arrived. Aside from Trump , Netanyahu and Putin,  Elon is the most unpopular person in the world today.
That is easily the dumbest hat I've seen in quite a while and we've all seen a LOT of MAGA hats.

It's painfully obvious that the whole administration has bought into some absolute bullshit lie from Elon Musk about his, garbage tier, Grok AI being ready to take over most of the federal government's functions. Elon is a great con man when dealing with people who understand tech. When he starts selling shit to the types of people in the Trump admin it is like shooting fish in a barrel. This whole experiment is going to destroy the US standing in the world, it's economy, and the US tech industry. We are getting Xed at a national scale. If you voted for this you are an absolute fucking dipshit.
Have you noticed that DOGE does the worst things on Friday afternoons? DOGE fears accountability
You have to be truly evil and dead inside to dismantle the Peace Corps. There’s a special place in hell reserved for Elon Musk.
Now Musk and Doge can f right off.  Peace Corp was created by JFK.  HANDS OFF!! MOTHAF'ERS!!!

posts.title: Federal judge rules return of Maryland man mistakenly deported to El Salvador prison
top_comments: It's not over till he's home.

if we lived in a sane country, he and his family would be able to sue for tens of millions. the entire saga is fucking ridiculous. 

"we know we fucked up, but it would be against our shit plan to undo it so cope ig"
an innocent man just can be held in jail?  What kind of crazy idea is that ... oh due process?  human rights?...huh I am pretty sure the Republican party gave those up

Interesting how the Trump admin indicates it can do nothing about retrieving this man from El Salvador with whom it has very friendly relations, yet it was able to get Mexico to bring back the 2 Caucasian people who were in jail for defrauding a timeshare company in Mexico after 2 weeks of negotiating (as they were apparently guilty of the fraud).

So all that is really at play here is that the Trump admin does not want to bring this person back, because they are not white.  It is as simple as that.

The truth is this Nazi admin doesn't want this man back because he'll be able to speak on how terrible and inhumane the treatment is at this death camp. They could get him back no problem, its that it would not bode well for them if they did.
Republicans would call this judicial overreach

And for every story like this we see, you just *know* there's a hundred cataclysmic fuck-ups that we're not seeing. 

Last time this ape was in charge his equivocating gibberish and asinine policies exacerbated a deadly pandemic [leading to many, many unnecessary COVID deaths] (https://www.businessinsider.com/analysis-trump-covid-19-response-40-percent-us-deaths-avoidable-2021-2?op=1) and [dead Americans in general](https://www.forbes.com/sites/tommybeer/2021/02/11/trumps-policies-resulted-in-the-unnecessary-deaths-of-hundreds-of-thousands-of-americans-lancet-report/) but none of this ever gets brought up and he surely sleeps like a baby.

I shudder to think of what we don't know.
I hope he's returned swiftly and safely, but I doubt part of disappearing people is keeping track of where they wind up at the other end. I've never worked as a human trafficker, so idk.
If we can extradite someone from another country, for a criminal case, then how can the government say here, “he’s already gone, there’s nothing we can do [shrug]”?

It sounds like if the courts “don’t have jurisdiction over him”, the courts need to jail the agents and the department heads that they do have “jurisdiction” over for contempt until they figure out how to produce him.

posts.title: Woman, 20, sentenced for false rape report that jailed innocent man for a month
top_comments: Feel so bad for this guy, anyone who has tried to get a search result taken off of google knows how impossible it is through their bots. On top of the false charge he will have to explain this surely emotionally draining charge to any employer or future girlfriend

Many years ago (I was around 17) I was accused of assault and rape by a woman I had never met, never seen before. I was arrested and detained and sent to Juvenile Detention. My parents lawyered up, Bailed me out 3 days or so later. It ended when her story kept changing and I had no wounds on my hands or face the night I was booked.  Can go much deeper in to the story but I won’t bore y’all. It was scary. She knew my address, phone number (land line back then) my vehicle, my overall everything. I was at my GF’s house after school, did some day boozing, walked 2 blocks home, and went to bed. Then I was “woken up” about 4 hours later. Lots of people I’ve told the story too have said “I’ve had handled it this way”. But I was woken up from a dead sleep, completely confused, 3 cops screaming at me, my dad freaking out, my mom in hysterics. 

There were no consequences for the accuser. I moved across country for school and that was it. That was around ‘89 or ‘90. Fucking sucked.

I was a victim of a girl who raped me and stalked me.  I avoided her at all costs, and she eventually moved on.  I suspect she had the same sort of relationship with the next guy she started dating - because I know she was very upset with him.  showed up at a bar, and acted all drunk, and brought him out to her car, where she had sex with him.  he went back into the bar and she ran in and said he raped her.  

The guy was taken away in handcuffs, and couldn't believe what was happening to him.  She eventually came clean, but the damage was done - the dude had mugshots, and was arrested in the middle of a crowded bar.  she didn't get so much as a slap on the wrist.  From what I understand, the guy was just so happy to have the charges dropped against him.  But he should have pressed charges against her for the damage she did to him.  

This was about 20 years ago that this happened.  and I still worry about how I was just a few months away from being 'the guy' in this story.
I'm sure the 41 year old guy who faced a month in jail with his name and picture plastered over press releases will never face any ongoing discrimination when his name comes up in job searches
I'm actually surprised she went to jail...

>  and pay $3,600 in restitution to the victim.

Straight to civil court for me! I’m asking for no less than $50k, that’s assuming there are no other damages besides my time for a month.

I used to be a college professor and told freshmen over and over:  Rape can happen to you; false rape allegations can happen to you. Never put yourself in a vulnerable position.  If you are drinking, go with friends and STAY with friends.

That isn’t a surefire preventative but it helps.

As a woman - I'm glad to see this.

Scumbags like her are a big reason why actual victims aren't believed. Her punishment is way too light, in my opinion, though.

My question is why did it take a month to free him. I went and found the reporting of his original arrest

https://www.cbsnews.com/philadelphia/news/daniel-pierson-arrest-attempted-rape-kidnapping-middletown-township-grocery-store-parking-lot/

>"Pierson is known to police to be a methamphetamine user," the release said.

Guess they thought they had to add that in there. Bail was set at somewhere under a million so that is why he was in jail...

I’ve gotten SA’d before but no one ever believed me, not even my own family. Oh why, because I’m a big strong man so it wouldn’t have happened, like cmon jfc how does that have anything to do with what happened. I’m still traumatized and I haven’t spoken about it in years and never will since it won’t ever get anywhere only make me feel worse about myself.
